responsibilities: Built an AI-powered safety compliance app with React Native and Expo.

Reduced app load times by replacing AsyncStorage with MMKV.
Developed coupon search and filtering features, increasing user engagement.
Enhanced website UI for responsiveness across devices.
Optimized admin panel UI for quicker task completion.
